alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette; Henry; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 6:01PM EST until January 03 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EST FOR NORTHEASTERN SPALDING...FAYETTE...WESTERN HENRY AND CENTRAL CLAYTON COUNTIES... At 601 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Jw Smith Reservoir, or near Fayetteville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Brooks, Woolsey, Sunny Side, Lake Spivey, Starrs Mill, Walker Mill, Inman, Jw Smith Reservoir, Towalaga, Birdie and Bonanza. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for north central and west central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
